jrtr
Class RenderItem

java.lang.Object
  jrtr.RenderItem

public class RenderItem
extends java.lang.Object

A data structure that contains a shape and its transformation. Its purpose is to pass data from the scene manager to the renderer via the SceneManagerIterator.
